text:
I remove direct call to deprecated project, location, tasktype Task field, 
replaced by an accessor way into tasks.

I remove too some unused variable declaration and some unused imports.
creator: emmanuel.feller@free.fr

text:
Created attachment 7872
patch to supress deprecated direct call to project, location ...
creator: emmanuel.feller@free.fr
antoine@apache.org
text:
Patch committed, thanks
Only the changes fileUtils --> FileUtils were scrapped.

I am please it can help.

I do not understand why you scrapped the fileUtils changes ? As the method is 
static it should be accessed by a static way, isn't it ?

Emmanuel
creator: emmanuel.feller@free.fr

text:
I did not apply the changes fileUtils -> FileUtils because I thought there must 
be a reason for this common pattern in ant, but maybe I am wrong.
Thanks very much for your contribution.
Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org

text:
Hi,
in report 22326 similar changes (removal of deprecated methods / fields and
removal of class loading to get around 1.1 issues) are proposed (on much more
classes though) where the same change was made regarding static access, I wonder
what could possibly be the reason for the pattern not to use static methods in a
static way?
creator: jkf@apache.org
